amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-593 as En Bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14 and 16.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
